summary:
Riften Ratway\'s very own Dark Brotherhood Merchant.
3 new ingredients. 2 new craftable poisons. 1 new spell.
descriptionHtml:
Give your enemies a quick or slow death with the help of Riften Ratway\'s very own Dark Brotherhood Merchant.

============================================================================================

Currently selling:-

Bows and Arrows

Various potions and poisons including Cyanide.

A few ingredients including new imports - Shadow Walker Heart, Nethervoid Salts, Burnt Oak Ash.

Some spells and recipes, plus a new spell - Zyklon - B - a very powerful cyanide based poisonous gas.

There are also 2 craftable cyanide poisons (quick death and slow death), these are obtainable via the cook pot.
You\'ll need those new ingredients to create them.

He\'ll also buy from you any item (even stolen items) as he has plenty of gold.

Installation is easy - Download with NMM!
Uninstalling? - Just delete the file from your data folder!

============================================================================================

Optional files! These are standalone versions of the ones included in the main file.

ONLY DOWNLOAD THESE FILES IF YOU DON\'T WANT THE MAIN FILE!
(it won\'t matter if you have all 3 files installed as you\'ll just have more of the various items but it will take away the point of the merchant)

Cyanide : Adds 2 versions of a craftable (via the cook pot in Misc) poison - Quick death and Slow death.

Zyklon - B : The spell tome is somewhat hidden but seek and ye shall find.

If downloading both, just install the other file you chose but click NO when it asks if you want to update.

============================================================================================

The main file works fine in my game but let me know if it all works for you and if there are any bugs.
author: Skarz88

files.name: Zyklon - B - INCLUDED IN MAIN FILE
